data.text:
Whenever I go to Barcelonona I stay at the Royal Ramblas. Excellent service. The concierge is very attentive and friendly.
The breakfast is wonderful and it is well worth ending your stay with breakfast.
The rooms are clean and organized.
The only suggestion is to have a gym, as there isn't one on the Royal Ramblas and that makes a lot of difference. It's just not excellent for this reason.
data.title: Very good, the only thing missing is a gym room to be excellent

data.text: The stay at this hotel has been the best experience of our entire trip through Spain, and we owe it all to the attention of the staff, Lilian Aragon and Hector Morales. Their treatment made us feel at home, demonstrating a lot of professionalism, respect, and knowledge to guide us to the places of most interest to us. The hotel has a perfect location, with quick access to the city center, very clean, and the rooms offer good comfort, with views of the city as well as its cafeteria.
data.title: The best experience in Spain

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.

It was truly a pleasure to learn that everything was to your satisfaction during your stay. Your kind comments will encourage our team members to continue pursuing excellence in all that we do!

Thank you for noting our location; we are glad that this was convenient for you.

We hope that you will consider returning to stay with us in the future.
Kindest regards,

Xavier Tor, Director
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Excellent hotel!!!! The staff is very friendly and helpful!!!  Rooms were very clean and modern. The hotel is centrally located with easy access to the subway, taxis, and busses. And if youâ€™re up for walking, many destinations are within walking distance. We highly recommend this hotel and will certainly stay here again on future visits!!
data.title: Excellent, friendly staff! Perfect location!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Michaelgx, 
Thank you for sharing your feedback following your recent stay.

We are very happy to know you enjoyed our prime location which is an ideal starting point for discovering what our great city has to offer. We appreciate your kind comments about our dedicated team who do their best to ensure that we deliver the best service and always meet your expectations.

We look forward to welcoming you back.
Best regards,

Xavier Tor, Director
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Right now, the hotel is in plain restoration, causing a great amount of noise and dust.There are rooms not suitable for use and that is not advised in the booking . I have to be relocated because of the construction noise in that part of the hotel and the part where I was relocated the floors were dressed with construction paper to avoid dust to accumulate in the aisle rugs!
data.title: Bad experience!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Vivien,
Thank you very much for your feedback.

We are truly sorry to hear about the inconvenience caused by the restoration work during your stay. Our hotel's prime location and commitment to service excellence are usually highlights for our guests, and we regret that your experience was overshadowed by the ongoing renovations. While we endeavor to maintain a comfortable environment, it seems we fell short in this instance. Please be assured that we take your comments seriously and continuously strive to improve our guests' experiences.

We do hope to welcome you back in the future. 
All the best.

Jaume, desk manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
The standard room is very small.the pillows are so not comfortable, the room has no sound proof. You can hear everything outside and the room above you.
But the most unfair issue is that the hotel is under renovation and they didn't say that while I was booking a room through their website. I would expect to get a notice on the website and to decide if I want to stay in a hotel that doing constructions all day every day .
When you want to take a rest in the middle of the day between your tours outside,it's unbearable!!
And of course the room rate was the same.
Hotel management - if you know you are going to run constructions- at least you can do is to announce it before booing.
At least you can do is to offer a discount rate becau6of that
You did neither and it's unfair.
I have 2 stars because the front desk was really nice. But that is not a reason to stay at hotel that doesn't give you the vacation mode you need
data.title: Hotel under renovation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Hila,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback,

We're glad to hear that our front desk team provided you with a pleasant experience. Our staff strives to deliver the utmost service, and it's rewarding to know this was reflected during your stay. However, we regret to hear about the disturbances you encountered. While our accommodations are soundproof, it seems we did not meet your expectations in this regard. Regarding the renovations, we endeavor to ensure that all our guests are informed of any ongoing work that may impact their stay, and we apologize if this was not communicated effectively to you. Please be assured that your comments are important to us, and we are committed to providing a comfortable environment for all our guests.

We look forward to welcoming you back. 
Best wishes,

Jaume, desk manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
